name: Victory Hand
baseMeaning: Index and middle fingers forming a V, for victory or peace.
tldr: Peace! Used for victory, peace sign, casual goodbye, or selfie pose.

contextMeanings.meaning: Leaving a situation or checking out.
Cute selfie pose or casual flirting.

platformNotes.note: Common for casual goodbyes and peace.
Popular in selfie and exit content.

seoTitle: ✌️ Victory Hand Emoji Meaning - What Does ✌️ Really Mean?
seoDescription: Learn what the peace sign emoji ✌️ really means. Used for peace, victory, or casual goodbyes. Complete context guide.
